datas.text: I've been looking at BTC's chart and I think we should go long.
Why do you think now is a good time to long BTC?
Check out the RSI on the 4-hour chart. It's been oversold for a while, and we're seeing bullish divergence.
Also, the moving averages just crossed — the 50-day MA broke above the 200-day MA. That golden cross usually signals a strong uptrend is coming.
Makes sense. I'll prepare the long command.
Yeah, I agree with him. The indicators are pointing towards a bullish trend. It’s a good time to take a long position.
Position closed: 10 BTC for 3000 SOL. PNL +50%
